name: Ludum Gladiatorium
description:
Step into the brutal and bloody arena to become the greatest Gladiator in all of history.

Ludum Gladiatorium is a text-based gladiator simulation with gritty in-depth combat. Start as a new recruit, win gold and the love of the crowd with every victory. Spend money on upgrading your armor and weapons as you take on increasingly challenging opponents.

FEATURES

  • Gritty turn based combat where every move counts
  • Earn money and spend it on upgrading weapons and armor
  • Face increasingly more difficult opponents as you climb the ranks
  • Earn the love and respect of the crowd by putting on a good show

Blood will be spilt. Your destiny awaits you.

THIS GAME IS CURRENTLY IN A PRE-ALPHA STATE

Not all of the alpha game mechanics are implemented or in anyway complete and some features are prototypes and subject to change.
